title: Pierce Brosnan says he's heard his Black Adam character is "going to have his own show, or his own movie" and is "going to be in the next Superman"
summary: Pierce Brosnan is reportedly considering a return to comic book movies, following his DCEU debut in 'Black Adam', despite prior uncertainties regarding the franchise's future.

title: Betty Gilpin Joins Ron Howard’s Amazon MGM Military Drama ‘Alone At Dawn’
summary: Betty Gilpin has joined Adam Driver and Anne Hathaway in Ron Howard's upcoming Amazon MGM military drama, "Alone at Dawn." The film is based on a 2019 book and is currently in development.

title: Financial Firm GFI Group Expands to 129K SF at 55 Water Street
summary: Financial services firm GFI Group is significantly expanding its office presence in Manhattan's Financial District, doubling its footprint to a total of 128,749 square feet by adding an extra 64,993 square feet.

title: Yankees Predicted To Land Superstar Slugger With $360 Million Blockbuster
summary: Yankees principal owner Hal Steinbrenner spoke at a press conference at Yankee Stadium in Bronx, New York, on December 21, 2022.

title: Malayalam’s first action hero did over 100 films in 6 years; died performing dangerous stunt hanging from a helicopter
summary: The article delves into the origins and nature of Malayalam cinema, emphasizing its deep roots in the socio-political fabric of Kerala society and its consistent portrayal of stories centered around common people, reflecting the realities of the region.

title: Warren Beatty and Carrie Fisher, Then 17, Take a Break During Filming of the Movie “Shampoo” (1975)
summary: Shampoo is a 1975 American comedy film directed by Hal Ashby, starring Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Goldie Hawn, Lee Grant, Jack Warden, Tony Bill, and Carrie Fisher.

title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, an investment advisor, published its third-quarter 2025 investor letter, which includes a market review and quarterly performance update.

title: Paras Defence wins ₹71.68 cr DRDO order for submarine optronic periscopes
summary: Paras Defence and Space Technologies Ltd. has secured a 71.68-crore order from the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) for the supply of two Optronic Periscopes.

title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, an investment advisor, released its Core Equity Strategy third-quarter 2025 investor letter, which included a market review and quarterly performance details.

title: How India’s experience reflects on women’s evolving role in peacekeeping
summary: The Indian Army is planning to induct women soldiers into its Territorial Army (TA) battalions, a significant move aimed at expanding opportunities for women within the armed forces for the first time.

title: India-UK military exercise 'Ajeya Warrior-25' begins in Rajasthan
summary: The eighth edition of the India-UK joint military exercise 'Ajeya Warrior-25' has commenced at the Mahajan field firing ranges in Bikaner, Rajasthan. The exercise is conducted under a United Nations mandate.
